news.title: Watch: Footage shows explosions and buildings ablaze in Tehran
news.summary: Israel says it has carried out strikes on Iran's nuclear programme, with blasts and fires seen in Tehran.

news.title: What we know about Israel's attacks on Iran
news.summary: Iranian state media reported Revolutionary Guards chief Hossein Salami was among those killed.

news.title: Analysis: Israel chose to act now, whether Trump likes it or not
news.summary: There has been a growing tension between the leaders over Iran - now the US is distancing itself from Israel's "unilateral action".

news.title: US says it was not involved in Israel's military strikes
news.summary: Secretary of State Marco Rubio says Israel took "unilateral action" and warns Iran not to retaliate against US forces.

news.title: World-first blood cancer therapy to be given on NHS
news.summary: It sneaks toxic drugs inside cancer cells to hit them hard while minimising side-effects.

news.title: Trump administration blocked from  deploying National Guard to LA
news.summary: A judge's order that Trump return control of California's National Guard will not go into effect immediately.

news.title: 'My kids are the reason I'm alive': Backstage with Shakira
news.summary: Shakira says the situation facing immigrants in the US is "painful" as she talks to the BBC in Miami.

news.title: Watch: Mel Stride pushed to say sorry for Liz Truss's mini-budget
news.summary: Watch: Mel Stride pushed to say sorry for Liz Truss's mini-budget

news.title: Brit School receives funds for building repairs
news.summary: The Brit School in Croydon has taught many students who would go on to superstardom.

news.title: Scheffler and McIlroy off pace at bruising US Open
news.summary: Rory McIlroy and Scottie Scheffler are among many to find  Oakmont Country Club a bruising challenge as JJ Spaun sets the pace on day one at the US Open.
